result.execSummary:
The defendant Rodney J. Schmidt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample.  No contact with S.L.C. or her residence, workplace or school.  Any other conditions per agent.  ALL COURT ORDERED OBLIGATIONS TO BE PAID THROUGH CLERK OF COURTS WITHIN 60 DAYS OR SET UP PAYMENT ARRANGEMENTS.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rodney J. Schmidt

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt:
Atty Van Wagner enters NC plea to Ct 1.  DE also pleads NC.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds DE guilty.  Court advises DE re: voting rights and felony firearms warnings.  State moves to revoke DPA in 15CF151 and dismiss that case.  Atty Van Wagner is in agreement and will no longer raise the issue of the alford plea issue in that case.  Court grants dismissal of Ct 1 in 15CF151.  State states joint recommendation.  Atty Van Wagner makes statement on behalf of DE.  DE has nothing to add.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

Probation for 2 years
$518.00 costs/surcharges to be paid to Clerk of Courts Office w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
DNA sample to be provided
Conditions of probation:
No contact with S.L.C. or her workplace, residence or school
Any other conditions per agent
Cash bond from 15CF151 to be applied to costs in this case before being refunded
Atty Van Wagner acknowledges rec. information and waives reading and will plead NC.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.
Atty Van Wagner and DE waive prelim.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause/binds DE over.sib

03:37 PM Defendant Rodney J. Schmidt in court with attorney Christopher T. Van Wagner.  Rick C Spoentgen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant received and waives reading of complaint.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Court finds probable cause.  Preliminary hearing is waived.  $500.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Booking today.
